I.name: Warpath
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Hecarim''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} equal to {{as|{{pp|key=%|12 to 24 for 7|1;3 to 18|formula=12%+2% every 3 levels starting from level 3}} of his {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
I.descriptionHtml: Innate: Hecarim gains bonus attack damage equal to 1;3 to 18 â€’ undefined of his bonus movement speed.
I.notes:
* ''Warpath's'' '''bonus''' attack damage will adjust itself to any temporary movement speed [[buff|buffs]] and [[debuff]]s '''Hecarim''' is affected by.
** Since this only affects '''bonus''' values '''Hecarim''' will not dip below his regular attack damage if he is {{tip|slow|slowed}} below his '''base''' movement speed.
* The amount of movement speed scaling to '''bonus''' attack damage is refreshed every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

Q.name: Rampage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against {{tip|minions}}.

If '''Hecarim''' damages at least one enemy with ''Rampage'', he gains a [[buff]] for 8 seconds, [[stack]]ing up to two times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging hits. The buff increases the damage of ''Rampage'' by 2% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} and reduces the '''base''' cooldown by 1, up to a 4% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} damage increase and a reduction in 2 seconds of the '''base''' cooldown at two stacks.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against minions.
If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with Rampage, he gains a buff for 8 seconds, stacking up to two times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging hits. The buff increases the damage of Rampage by 2% (+ 3% per 100 bonus AD) and reduces the base cooldown by 1, up to a 4% (+ 6% per 100 bonus AD) damage increase and a reduction in 2 seconds of the base cooldown at two stacks.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minion damage|{{ap|60*0.6 to 180*0.6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*0.6}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD)
  • Minion damage: (+ % bonus AD)

W.name: Spirit of Dread
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies every second.

While ''Spirit of Dread'' is active, '''Hecarim''' is {{tip|heal|healed}} for 30% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% of 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.25}}% of 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every second.
While Spirit of Dread is active, Hecarim is healed for 30% (+ 2.5% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% (+ 1.25% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against minions and monsters.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20*4 to 60*4}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
W.notes: * The healing cap against minions accounts for every single one regardless of how many are present and/or affected by ''Spirit of Dread'' at the time of cast.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 20% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)

E.name: Devastating Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|type=time active|key=%|25 to 65 for 13|0 to 3|formula=3.3% '''bonus total''' movement speed every 0.25 seconds. ''This is capped at 3 seconds.''}} '''bonus total''' movement speed|ms}}}} for 4 seconds.

'''Hecarim's''' next [[basic attack]] during this time gains {{pp|type=distance traveled|50 to 250 for 9|0 to 1200}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} and causes him to {{tip|dash}} towards the target's direction, {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during the dash, the {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} is consumed and '''Hecarim''' {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}} {{pp|type=distance traveled|250 to 450 for 9|0 to 1200}} units, though not through terrain, {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, and deals them modified {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=distance traveled|key=%|0 to 100 for 9|0 to 1200}}.

''Devastating Charge'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Hecarim's ''' basic attack timer and can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
''Devastating Charge's duration is paused during {{ai|Onslaught of Shadows|Hecarim}}.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim becomes ghosted and gains 0 to 3 â€’ undefined bonus total movement speed for 4 seconds.
Hecarim's next basic attack during this time gains 0 to 1200 â€’ undefined bonus range and causes him to dash towards the target's direction, revealing them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during the dash, the bonus movement speed is consumed and Hecarim knocks them back 0 to 1200 â€’ undefined units, though not through terrain, stuns them for 0.25 seconds, and deals them modified physical damage, increased by 0 to 1200 â€’ undefined.
Devastating Charge resets Hecarim's basic attack timer and can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage.
Devastating Charge's duration is paused during Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 90}} {{as|(+ 55% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|30*2 to 90*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|55*2}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
E.notes:
* '''Hecarim''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]] while {{tip|dash|dashing}}.
** {{ai|Onslaught of Shadows|Hecarim}} will interrupt the dash.
* If the target does not remain nearby during the dash, ''Devastating Charge's'' effect will not be consumed.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with other sources of movement speed boosts.
* The bonus attack range stacks additively with {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
* ''Devastating Charge'' will still apply its effects to the target even if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, but not if he goes into {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Devastating Charge's'' damage will apply {{sti|life steal|link=true}} and will affect structures.
* ''"Distance traveled"'' can be simple movement as well as {{tip|dash|dashing}} and {{tip|blink|blinking}}.
* ''Devastating Charge's'' damage will not bypass {{tip|block}} or {{tip|dodge}} but the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} will still be applied.
** ''Devastating Charge'' will still deal damage while {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Hecarim''' loses the {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}} from ''Devastating Charge''.
** '''Hecarim''' will not use the empowered attack while {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* The {{tip|dash}} does not follow targets. The target's position at the time of the enhanced attack is the direction '''Hecarim''' will leap to.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will not resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.

R.name: Onslaught of Shadows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to the target location and summons 5 spectral riders {{tt|in an arrow formation|see notes}} that charge alongside him in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in their path and {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

Upon arrival, he {{tip|fear|fears}} nearby enemies for {{pp|type=distance traveled|0.75 to 2 for 11|0 to 1000}} seconds, and gradually {{tip|slow|slows}} them by up to 99% over the duration. ''The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is based on how far the affected units are from '''Hecarim''', having no slow at all from very close range.''
''The wave of spectral riders travels independently of '''Hecarim''' and will always charge at the same distance. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim dashes with displacement immunity to the target location and summons 5 spectral riders in an arrow formation that charge alongside him in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in their path and revealing them for 2.5 seconds.
Upon arrival, he fears nearby enemies for 0 to 1000 â€’ undefined seconds, and gradually slows them by up to 99% over the duration. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is based on how far the affected units are from Hecarim, having no slow at all from very close range.
The wave of spectral riders travels independently of Hecarim and will always charge at the same distance. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
R.notes:
* The spectral rider missiles originate at '''Hecarim's''' location, 145 units behind and 100 units to either side of him, and 290 units behind and 200 units to either side. They travel 1510 units forward parallel to Hecarim from their origin each.
* Only the spectral riders deal damage to enemies they pierce, '''Hecarim''' only dashes and fears enemies at the end of it.
